AI Description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source relational database management system known for its reliability, robustness, and performance. It offers advanced features such as multi-version concurrency control, point-in-time recovery, and full ACID compliance.
Core Features: Relational Database Management System, Open-Source, Acid Compliance, Mvcc (Multi-Version Concurrency Control), Point-In-Time Recovery, Extensible, Support For Json, Xml, & Other Non-Structured Data Types
General Tags: Database Management, Relational Database, Open Source, Data Management
